column5: Hey guys, looking for a walleye guide, for a half day or full day for the walleye opening week in and round that time frame probably 3 or 4 guys any recommendations? Anyone on here that does it? What kinda prices am i looking at?
Check out U & Me Guide Service.  Lloyd is top notch.     Here is the link to his personal website. U & Me
Welcome to the board walleye dreamer.  From ample posts over the past few years here, from what i can gather, Lloyd is your man.
Yup, Lloyd is the man he seems to have Quinte dialed in and he has put me on many large Walleye U & Me Guide Service.
Mr Greg Klatt, at http://www.profishntanglingservices.com  - he's a good friend and great guide.  Whoever you chose, good luck.
Who ever you choose make sure they are Transport Canada inspected and approved and also have all the certificates needed to be a guide/charter.  Myself and also Fishfinder Charters are.
Another vote for UandMe....my avatar pic came from a day spent with him, and I recommend him every chance I get

I'll be fishing with U & Me Guide service (Fishhunter) with 3 other folks from this board the third weekend in May. I have never fished with Lloyd but the many people who recommended him, I trust implicitly. Good luck whomever you might choose.

U and ME!! Lloyd works none stop to put you on fish. my first guide service was a testimonial of what a great guide should be. great time ! so much info given about what we were doin' and why. damn near froze that nov. but had an awesome day.
